title: Marker type font
content:
Can anyone ID this font? I have a similarish font called Komika but this is much nicer!

Cheers

S

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123102449im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/monster_children_6690.jpg)

 [‹ Wayne's World](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123102449/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45779 "Go to previous forum topic") [A whole lot of numbers ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123102449/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45274 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Flynner

comments.content: Hi Flynner, this is House Slant by House Industries and you can get it (well, that’s how I got it) for free when you register at [their site](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123102449/https:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=catalog). You can see the font [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123102449/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=23&subpage=viewfonts), just hit the LetterSetter button at the left and choose Sign Painter House Slant.
Nice one, got it, thanks Plumbago!
